main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a cylindrical object approximately 75 feet in diameter flying near Ellsworth Air Force Base in South Dakota.
interesting points: The object made a 180-degree banking turn and flew back into the clouds.
The object was initially spotted due to bright flashes of light.
The object was flying at an altitude of approximately 5,000 feet.
The object was determined to be a KC-135 aircraft, callsign Ghost 76, making a flight maneuver, based on a review of radar records.
sighted object: a cylindrical object approximately 75 feet in diameter
location: 5 miles southeast of Ellsworth AFB near Hermosa, South Dakota
witnesses: a civilian with the base Civil Engineers
